metadata.title: CVE-2020-11062 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In GLPI after 0.68.1 and before 9.4.6, multiple reflexive XSS occur inDropdown endpoints due to an invalid Content-Type. This has been fixed inversion 9.4.6.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
